text: Unforgiven (2000) was a professional wrestling pay-per-view show made by the World Wrestling Federation (WWF). It took place on September 24, 2000 at the First Union Center in Philadelphia, Pennsylvania. It was the third Unforgiven event held by the WWF. ==Matches== No. Results Stipulations Times 1 Right to Censor (Steven Richards, Val Venis, Bull Buchanan, and The Goodfather) defeated The Dudley Boyz (Bubba Ray and D-Von Dudley) and Acolytes Protection Agency (Faarooq and Bradshaw) Eight-man tag team match 6:05 2 Tazz defeated Jerry Lawler Strap Match 5:07 3 Steve Blackman (c) won by last defeating Perry Saturn Other competitors were: Test, Crash Holly, Al Snow and Funaki Hardcore battle royal for the WWF Hardcore Championship 10:00 4 Chris Jericho defeated X-Pac Singles match 9:05 5 Hardy Boyz (Matt and Jeff Hardy) (with Lita) defeated Edge and Christian (c) Steel cage match for the WWF Tag Team Championship 14:00 6 Eddie Guerrero (c) (with Chyna) defeated Rikishi by disqualification Singles match for the WWF Intercontinental Championship 6:10 7 Triple H (with Stephanie McMahon-Helmsley) defeated Kurt Angle No Disqualification match with Mick Foley as the special guest referee 17:28 8 The Rock (c) defeated Chris Benoit, The Undertaker and Kane Fatal Four-Way match for the WWF Championship 16:03 (c) â€“ refers to the champion(s) heading into the match ==References== ==Other websites== *Official Unforgiven 2000 website Category:2000 in professional wrestling Category:Sports in Philadelphia Category:WWE Unforgiven Category:2000 in the United States Category:20th century in Pennsylvania Category:2000s in Philadelphia
title: Unforgiven (2000)
